channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Trump officials weigh possible Kim Jong Un meeting during Asia trip, CNN reports
item.description: Trump administration officials are privately discussing a potential meeting between Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un during the US president's upcoming Asia visit, CNN reported on Saturday, citing sources familiar with the matter. Officials have not begun logistical arrangements or

item.title: China expels top general, 8 others from the Communist Party in anti-graft drive
item.description: China’s second-highest ranking general and eight other senior officials have been expelled from the ruling Communist Party and the military on suspicion of serious misconduct linked to corruption, the Defence Ministry said Friday. He Weidong, who was the vice-chair of the powerful Central Mi

item.title: Hungary to ensure Putin can enter country for Trump meeting in Budapest
item.description: Hungary will ensure that Russian President Vladimir Putin can enter the country for a summit with US President Donald Trump planned in Budapest and return home afterwards, Hungary's Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto said on Friday. Trump agreed on Thursday to a second summit on the war in Ukraine t

item.title: IMF, World Bank members look at Gaza reconstruction, challenges ahead
item.description: Top finance officials from around the world this week underscored their willingness to help rebuild the Palestinian enclave of Gaza as the World Bank and United Nations worked to finalise a new cost estimate of $70 billion.
